inputs.name: connectedServiceNameARM
inputs.label: Azure subscription contains IoT Hub
inputs.helpMarkDown: Select an Azure subscription that contains IoT Hub

inputs.name: deploymentid
inputs.label: IoT Edge Deployment ID
inputs.helpMarkDown: Input the IoT Edge Deployment ID, if ID exists, it will be overridden

inputs.name: priority
inputs.label: IoT Edge Deployment priority
inputs.helpMarkDown: Set the priority to a positive integer to resolve deployment conflicts: when targeted by multiple deployments a device will use the one with highest priority or (in case of two deployments with the same priority) latest creation time.

inputs.name: deviceOption
inputs.label: Choose single/multiple device
inputs.helpMarkDown: Choose to deploy to single or multiple(by tags) devices

inputs.name: targetcondition
inputs.label: Edge device Target Condition
inputs.helpMarkDown: Input the target condition of devices you would like to deploy. Do not use double quote. Example: tags.building=9 and tags.environment='test'

inputs.name: moduleJsons
inputs.label: Module.json File
inputs.visibleRule: action = Build || action = Build and Push
inputs.helpMarkDown: Path to the modules you would like to build. You can specify multiple files, each take one line. Reference for wildcard: https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/vsts/build-release/tasks/file-matching-patterns?view=vsts

inputs.name: dockerRegistryEndpoint
inputs.label: Docker Registry Connection
inputs.helpMarkDown: Select a Docker registry connection. Required for commands that need to authenticate with a registry.

inputs.name: dockerHostEndpoint
inputs.label: Docker Host Connection
inputs.helpMarkDown: Select a Docker host connection. Defaults to the agent's host.
